name: Eat Mania!
description:
Welcome to Eat Mania! Where you will love working for the rest of your life! Serve your customers with delicious meats, talk to them and bond with them, remember what they like, or don't, we don't care, as long as you keep serving the food!

Controls: Mouse

Currently there is only the tutorial, it's a prototype of an idea I had for a University project. Enjoy!

Music -> 

Menu: One-eyed Maestro by Kevin MacLeod
